  • Method Details

    • pushDedupedForms

      public static void pushDedupedForms(IBaseDataObject d, Collection<String> forms)
      As IBaseDataObject.pushCurrentForm(String) but makes sure each form is not already on the stack first.
      Parameters:
      d - data object to have form pushed into
      forms - that are pushed into current forms if not already present

    • pushDedupedForm

      As IBaseDataObject.pushCurrentForm(String) but makes sure each form is not already on the stack first.
      Parameters:
      d - data object to have form pushed into
      form - that are pushed into current forms if not already present

    • mergeParameter

      @Deprecated public static void mergeParameter(IBaseDataObject parent, String key, String val)
      Deprecated.
      Assume key is name of String value parameter. Check wither parent already has string value in a delim-separated string. If so do nothing, otherwise, add delim + value
      Parameters:
      parent - IBaseDataObject to mere String parameter with
      key - name of String parameter
      val - String to append if not already in parents values

      target - to copy to
